name: Speak English
description: If you need to improve your English speaking and listening skills, this app is for you. With a lot of English lessons in most common situations and a powerful interface, you are able to learn speaking and listening effectively. Lets study now! Apps Features: - Practice listening with thousands of lessons categorized by many daily topics; - Practice English conversation with very basic lessons; - Everyday vocabulary and sentences; - Online dictionary; - Bookmark lessons  - You can store audio files on sdcard to use later or listen online.
